Basic Model Predictive Control in Python

This is the index file for the jupyter notebooks on MPC in Python, developed for EL2700 at KTH.

Use the links below to navigate to the different notebooks in the project.

Notebooks on invariant sets

  1. Invariant sets - definitions and calculations

Notebooks on linear MPC

  1. Basic MPC on the double integrator

  2. MPC for altitude control of Cessna aircraft

  3. The effect of constraint softening

  4. Reference tracking on simple aircraft model

  5. Simple offset-free control

Notebooks on nonlinear MPC

  1. Comparison of numerical integration techniques for system discretization

  2. Multiple Shooting Pendulum Swing-Up

  3. Single Shooting Pendulum Swing-Up

  4. Simple nonlinear MPC of simple inverted pendulum

  5. Nonlinear MPC for Swing-up of a pendulum on a cart

  6. Nonlinear Tracking MPC for Heat Exchanger

  7. Offset-Free MPC for Heat Exchanger

Instructions

  • Click on the notebook links above to open the corresponding notebook.

  • Each notebook contains detailed explanations and code for specific topics and applications.
